original_text: Why did you not obey the Lord? Instead you have been greedy. You have hurried to take things for yourself. You have done something evil that does not please the Lord.’
korean_text: 어찌하여 왕이 여호와의 목소리를 청종하지 아니하고 탈취하기에만 급하여 여호와께서 악하게 여기시는 일을 행하였나이까

sentences.original_text: Why did you not obey the Lord?
You have hurried to take things for yourself.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 자신을 위해 것들을 서둘러 취했습니다.

sentences.original_text: that does not please the Lord.
